# n8n Code (Python) — normalize links, best text (text -> title -> slug), dedupe, classify
# Optional filters for product/category pages are provided below (toggle flags).

from urllib.parse import urljoin, urlparse, unquote
import re

# ---------------------- Config ----------------------
# Deduplicate by full URL (True) or by path only (False)
DEDUP_BY_FULL_URL = True

# Skip pager labels
SKIP_PAGER = True

# Optional filters (set only one of them to True if you want to filter)
FILTER_PRODUCTS_ONLY = False     # keep only product pages
FILTER_CATEGORIES_ONLY = False   # keep only category pages
# ----------------------------------------------------

PRODUCT_REGEX = re.compile(r"^/catalogue/.+?_\d+/(index\.html)?$", re.IGNORECASE)
CATEGORY_REGEX = re.compile(r"^/catalogue/category/.+?/index\.html$", re.IGNORECASE)

def slug_to_title(path: str) -> str:
    # Pick a good segment even if URL ends with index.html
    parts = [p for p in path.split("/") if p]
    if not parts:
        return ""
    candidate = parts[-1]
    if candidate.lower() == "index.html" and len(parts) >= 2:
        candidate = parts[-2]
    candidate = re.sub(r"_[0-9]+$", "", candidate)   # drop trailing _123
    candidate = re.sub(r"\.html$", "", candidate)    # drop .html
    candidate = candidate.replace("-", " ")
    candidate = re.sub(r"\s+", " ", candidate).strip()
    return candidate.title()

def is_product(path: str) -> bool:
    return bool(PRODUCT_REGEX.match(path))

def is_category(path: str) -> bool:
    return bool(CATEGORY_REGEX.match(path))

incoming = items if 'items' in globals() else [item]
out_items = []

for it in incoming:
    data = it.get("json", it) if isinstance(it, dict) else getattr(it, "json", {})

    base_url    = data.get("$('Edit Fields').first().json.url")
    links       = data.get("links") or []
    link_texts  = data.get("linkTexts") or []
    # support either "linkTitles" or "linkExtra" from HTML Extract
    link_titles = data.get("linkTitles") or data.get("linkExtra") or []

    seen = set()
    clean = []

    for i, href in enumerate(links):
        if not isinstance(href, str):
            continue
        h = href.strip()
        if not h:
            continue
        lower = h.lower()
        if lower.startswith(("#", "mailto:", "tel:", "javascript:")):
            continue

        abs_url = urljoin(base_url, h)
        parsed = urlparse(abs_url)
        path = parsed.path + (("?" + parsed.query) if parsed.query else "")

        # Optional filtering
        if FILTER_PRODUCTS_ONLY and not is_product(parsed.path):
            continue
        if FILTER_CATEGORIES_ONLY and not is_category(parsed.path):
            continue

        # Dedup
        key = abs_url if DEDUP_BY_FULL_URL else parsed.path
        if key in seen:
            continue
        seen.add(key)

        # Build best text: linkTexts -> linkTitles -> slug
        t1 = (link_texts[i] if i < len(link_texts) else "") or ""
        t2_raw = link_titles[i] if i < len(link_titles) else None
        t2 = "" if t2_raw is None else str(t2_raw)
        text = (t1 or t2).strip()
        if not text:
            text = slug_to_title(unquote(parsed.path))

        if SKIP_PAGER and text.lower() in {"next", "previous"}:
            continue

        pb = urlparse(base_url)
        link_type = "internal" if pb.hostname == parsed.hostname else "external"

        clean.append({
            "href": abs_url,
            "text": text,
            "type": link_type,
            "host": parsed.hostname or "",
            "path": path,
        })

    # Sort: internal first, then by path
    clean.sort(key=lambda x: (0 if x["type"] == "internal" else 1, x["path"]))
    out_items.append({"json": {"links": clean}})

return out_items

from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import re
from math import ceil

def clean_text(s: str) -> str:
    s = re.sub(r"\s+", " ", s or "").strip()
    return s

def reading_time_minutes(words_count: int, wpm: int = 200) -> int:
    return max(1, ceil(words_count / max(1, wpm)))

out_items = []

for it in items:
    data = it.get("json", {})
    html = (data.get("data") or data.get("body") or "").strip()

    soup = BeautifulSoup(html, "html.parser")

    # הסרה של תגיות לא־טקסטואליות כדי לנקות את bodyText
    for tag in soup(["script", "style", "noscript", "template"]):
        tag.decompose()

    # כותרות
    h1_all = [clean_text(h.get_text()) for h in soup.find_all("h1")]
    h2_all = [clean_text(h.get_text()) for h in soup.find_all("h2")]
    h3_all = [clean_text(h.get_text()) for h in soup.find_all("h3")]

    # מטא
    def msel(name=None, prop=None, attr="content"):
        if name:
            el = soup.find("meta", attrs={"name": name})
        elif prop:
            el = soup.find("meta", property=prop)
        else:
            el = None
        return (el.get(attr) if el and el.has_attr(attr) else "") or ""

    title_tag = clean_text(soup.title.string if soup.title and soup.title.string else "")
    meta_desc = clean_text(msel(name="description"))
    og_title = clean_text(msel(prop="og:title"))
    og_desc = clean_text(msel(prop="og:description"))
    og_image = msel(prop="og:image")
    tw_title = clean_text(msel(name="twitter:title"))
    tw_desc  = clean_text(msel(name="twitter:description"))
    meta_keywords = clean_text(msel(name="keywords"))
    meta_robots   = clean_text(msel(name="robots"))

    canonical_href = ""
    link_canon = soup.find("link", rel=lambda v: v and "canonical" in [x.lower() for x in (v if isinstance(v, list) else [v])])
    if link_canon and link_canon.has_attr("href"):
        canonical_href = link_canon["href"]

    html_tag = soup.find("html")
    lang_attr = (html_tag.get("lang") if html_tag and html_tag.has_attr("lang") else "") or ""

    # טקסט גוף נקי וקצר יותר (למניעת נפחים מיותרים)
    body_text_full = clean_text(soup.get_text(" ", strip=True))
    words = re.findall(r"\w+", body_text_full)
    words_count = len(words)
    read_minutes = reading_time_minutes(words_count)

    # אקסרפט קצר (לדשבורד/תצוגה)
    excerpt = (body_text_full[:600] + "…") if len(body_text_full) > 600 else body_text_full

    # כותרת סופית מועמדת: עדיפות H1, אח"כ og/twitter/title
    page_title = (
        (h1_all[0] if h1_all else "") or
        og_title or
        tw_title or
        title_tag
    )

    out = {
        # בסיס
        "titleTag": title_tag,
        "pageTitle": page_title,
        "metaDescription": meta_desc,
        "ogTitle": og_title,
        "ogDescription": og_desc,
        "ogImage": og_image,
        "twitterTitle": tw_title,
        "twitterDescription": tw_desc,
        "canonicalHref": canonical_href,
        "langAttr": lang_attr,
        "metaKeywords": meta_keywords,
        "metaRobots": meta_robots,

        # כותרות
        "h1All": h1_all,
        "h2All": h2_all,
        "h3All": h3_all,

        # טקסט
        "bodyText": body_text_full,
        "excerpt": excerpt,

        # מדדים
        "wordCount": words_count,
        "readingTimeMinutes": read_minutes,
    }

    out_items.append({"json": out})

return out_items
